thread.title: Perfect meal at Mise en Place
thread.title_full: Perfect meal at Mise en Place - Review of Asara Wine Estate & Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Daniel W
title: Perfect meal at Mise en Place
text: All I can say about our meal at Mise en Place is that it was perfect and easily our best meal in the Cape Town area. The waterfront table was breathtaking, the service personal and friendly with great wine pairing advice. All the food was utterly delicious, presented beautifully and the perfect portion size. The wine was so good that we bought a couple of bottles to take away with us. If you're in the area then I highly suggest you have dinner here.
